description: Details required for Condition 17 (Drainage) of planning permission 19/00330/FUL (Erection of five/six storey building for 132 bedroom hotel with meeting room,  bar/restaurant and ground floor external terrace, car park and landscaping, together with the reconfiguration of Park Terrace).
site_name: Land At The Former Worcester Park
decision_conditions: The submitted information does not comply with the drainage hierarchy set out in the London Plan, Policy SI 13 and insufficient information has been submitted, in regards to runoff rates and the maintenance of each drainage component.  Therefore, the submission has not demonstrated how surface water run-off would be managed and the risk of flooding to and from the site mitigated in accordance with London Plan Policy S1 13, its associated Sustainable Design and Construction SPG, the Non-Statutory Technical Standards for Sustainable Drainage Systems and Kingston Council's LDF Core Strategy Policy DM4.
